text: David Wagner was the defending champion, but lost to Dylan Alcott in the final 7–5, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Final=== ===Round Robin=== Standings are determined by: 1) Number of wins; 2) Number of matches; 3) In two-players- ties, head-to-head records; 4) In three-players-ties, percentage of sets won, or of games won; 5) Steering Committee decision. ==External links== * Draw Wheelchair Quad Singles U.S. Open, 2018 Quad Singles
title: 2018 US Open – Wheelchair Quad Singles
